title: Sunshine chicken salad
ingredients: ['2 small chicken breasts', '2 eggs', '2 vine ripened tomatoes', '2 heaped tablespoons tinned or frozen sweetcorn', '1 carrot peeled and grated', 'good handful sliced cucumber', '3 large handfuls shredded cos lettuce or lettuce of your choice', '1 onion sliced', '1 pepper, any colour, sliced', 'seasoning to taste', 'small pot low fat natural yoghurt', 'piri piri sauce to taste']
